mapper.select: select org_tree_id, org_tree_name, org_tree_pid, org_tree_level from ahsydw_org_tree
mapper.insert: insert into ahsydw_org_tree(org_tree_id, org_tree_name, org_tree_pid, org_tree_level) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{pid}, #{level})
mapper.update: update ahsydw_org_tree set org_tree_name = #{name} where org_tree_id = #{id}
